Package model

Class Medicine

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Medicine
  • public class Medicine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the information for each medicine

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double costMedicine()
      This method calculates the cost of the medicine
      pre: The medicine was created before and its attributes dose and costDose must be not null.
      post: The cost is calculated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Medicine

        public Medicine​(java.lang.String name,
                double dose,
                double costDose,
                double frequency)
        Medicine constructor
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the medicine. This param must be not null.
        dose - the dose of the medicine for the patient. This param must be not null.
        costDose - the cost of each dose
        frequency - the frequency of the medicine
